  participant_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  participant_name VARCHAR(150) NOT NUll,
  participant_country VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  event_id INT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES past_sporting_events (event_id)
);

CREATE TABLE event_results (
  result_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  event_id INT NOT NULL,
  winner_id INT NOT NULL,
  loser_id INT NOT NULL,
  result_description TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES past_sporting_events (event_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (winner_id) REFERENCES event_participants (participant_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (loser_id) REFERENCES event_participants (participant_id)
);

CREATE TABLE event_statistics (
  stat_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  event_id INT NOT NULL,
  participant_id INT NOT NULL,
  points_scored INT,
  rebounds INT,
  assists INT,
  steals INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES past_sporting_events (event_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (participant_id) REFERENCES event_participants (participant_id)
);

CREATE TABLE event_comments (
  comment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  event_id INT NOT NULL,
  comment_text TEXT,
  comment_date TIMESTAMP,
  commenter_name VARCHAR(150),
  FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES past_sporting_events (event_id)
);

### STATEMENT

SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM past_sporting_events ORDER BY event_date DESC LIMIT 5;
